sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-select
    v-model="selectedColor"
    :items="colors"
    label="Select a color"
    item-text="name"
    item-value="colorCode"
    :menu-props="{ maxHeight: 200 }"
  />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      selectedColor: null,
      colors: [
        { name: 'Red', colorCode: '#FF0000' },
        { name: 'Green', colorCode: '#00FF00' },
        { name: 'Blue', colorCode: '#0000FF' }
      ]
    };
  }
};
</script>
